127020001.text: Congratulations on completing all Hexanexus in the beta!

127020002.text: You completed all the Hexanexus stages. You must find the Hexanexus engaging!

127020003.text: Of course it's engaging. That's why I continued playing!

127020004.text: I wanted to stop, but the treasures you give are too enticing

127020005.text: If I don't continue, aren't you going to report me at the Realm-Keeping Commission? I'm scared

127020006.text: If I may be honest with you, according to the Hex Club's prediction, a lot of people will fall in love and be obsessed with our Hexanexus

127020007.text: But from the current statistics, only you have been able to complete all the challenges. The success rate is very low

127020008.text: I'm the only one who completed all the stages? But your Hexanexus is so interesting. I don't believe you

127020010.text: Aren't you proficient in blackmailing? You can always report them. I'm not the only one you blackmailed, am I?

127020011.text: The Hex Club treats all friends who successfully retrieve the treasures in the same way

127020012.text: Although, none of them had taken heed of the warning from the Hex Club

127020013.text: WHAT!? So I'm the only one who spent so much time completing all the challenges? I've been such a fool

127020014.text: It wasn't all that bad. We promised to give you the treasures as long as you keep playing

127020015.text: And we did keep the promise. You took all the treasures from the challenge

127020016.text: Anyway, we hope to have a meeting with you. The intent of this meeting is: 1. To award you the Lifetime Hex Club Membership, and 2. to explore in-depth about your user experience and get some feedback

127020017.text: Not really interested in the lifetime membership. Maybe skip that

127020018.text: Aside from the title, we also prepared a reward for the first world clear of the game. Your loss if you miss it

127020019.text: But I already filled in the survey for you

127020020.text: That survey didn't have enough variables. We can't use it as a reference

127020021.text: We might as well talk to the target users face-to-face

127020022.text: Just tell me where are we meeting

127020023.text: Beside the Hexanexus device in the Artisanship Commission delve. I will be waiting for you there. Please make sure to come
